table.value: CREATE TABLE `wb_site_fields` ( `id` int(4) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `tag` varchar(225) NOT NULL, `title` varchar(225) DEFAULT '未命名', `ftype` int(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `orders` int(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `ls` int(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `sys` int(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=7 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
